channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Jimmy Carter made eradicating Guinea worm disease a top mission
item.description: Nobel Peace Prize winner Jimmy Carter spent decades waging war against an ancient parasite. Carter has tried to rid the Earth of Guinea worm, which infects people who drink unclean water tainted with larva.

item.title: Trump endorses Mike Johnson to stay on as House Speaker despite government funding turmoil
Jimmy Carter: Many evolutions for a centenarian ‘citizen of the world’
